April 13, 1965
Hr. Lou Peneguy ,
Alabama EOT Commission
2151 Highland Avenue
Suite 206
Birmingham# Alabama 35205
Dear Mr Peneguy:
next Keys letter will contain a list of HAEB Committees, and I wanted
to let you know why the Public Relatione Committee is no longer listed/
Ehere is no doubt that the NAEB needs a well developed PR program, but
this should really be a staff function. I believe you will agree that
a sound Public Relations program cannot be conducted by a committee. If
certain specific matters seem to need committee advice and assistance
(e.g. the present work being done by lee Campion add Marion Corwell on
a speakers guide), either ad hoc csramittees, or one or two individuals will
be asked to help out.
I appreciate the very real service this committee has provided in the
face of extreme administrative difficulties, and you may be sure that
1 will call upon you again.
Sincere|y,
William G. Harley
